title: China Faces Fresh Virus Threat From Its Border With Russia
description: China is facing a wave of coronavirus infections from Russia, with more than half of the country’s total imported cases in the past two days coming through its northeastern land border.
content:
Employees work at a sanitizer products workshop in Harbin, Heilongjiang Province, March 23.
Photographer: Xinhua News Agency via Getty Images
